message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if $13,000 is the right fit for my budget. I'm willing to consider $9,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000.
